resources.string: Welcome to McCann FitzGerald - Ireland\'s leading law firm

The McCann FitzGerald IT Support Desk operates from 8am - 10:15pm Monday to Friday. There is an on call service answering urgent calls on Saturday and Sunday from 9.15am - 5:30pm. Please email help@mcf.ie. To submit a support case please click on the below button

The Business Development Group at McCann FitzGerald looks after all of our clients business needs. We pride ourselves on our first class client service. We can provide state of the art facilities to clients hosting, informal meetings to formal and mediation events. The group is also at the forefront of the MCF Trainee\'s scheme. For more information please call us.
